entities.name: aragog
entities.description: Aragog is a large spider who emerges from the misty domed web. He is described as having grey in the black of his body and legs, and each of the eyes on his ugly, pincer head is milky white. He is blind.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who has been caught by Aragog's spider. He feels scared and tries to communicate with the spiders.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as being brought by another spider, but he does not appear in the scene.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a person who is associated with Harry and Ron. Aragog asks if Hagrid is among the strangers.

relationships.description: Aragog's spider catches Harry, indicating a relationship of capture or entrapment.
Aragog's spider also catches Ron, similar to the relationship with Harry.
Harry tries to communicate with Aragog by shouting that they are friends of Hagrid's.
Aragog orders the spiders to kill the strangers, indicating a relationship of command or authority.
